D

Destroy routine that is invoked by TeaServlet when the servlet is being shutdown.

G

Get the type of context that this application will create.
getGreeting(String) - Method in class org.teatrove.examples.helloworld.HelloWorldContext
Get the greeting for the given user based on the greeting defined for this instance (ie: provided in the constructor).

H

HelloWorldApplication - Class in org.teatrove.examples.helloworld
This is a simple Hello World TeaServlet application that provides access to the HelloWorldContext.

Default constructor.
HelloWorldContext - Class in org.teatrove.examples.helloworld
This is a plain POJO context method that provides public getter methods.
HelloWorldContext(String) - Constructor for class org.teatrove.examples.helloworld.HelloWorldContext
Main constructor to create an instance of this context with the given greeting.

I

init(ApplicationConfig) - Method in class org.teatrove.examples.helloworld.HelloWorldApplication
Initialization routine that is invoked by TeaServlet after invoking the default constructor to allow the application to configure itself.
